Plugin mirror - developer information¶

Go this plugin documentation

xPL Schema¶

The sensor.basic schema is used by this plugin.

Here are the events for which a xPL message is sent

Mir:ror faced up¶

xpl-trig
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=mirror
type=activated
current=HIGH
}

Mir:ror faced down¶

xpl-trig
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=mirror
type=activated
current=LOW
}

A RFID element is detected¶

xpl-trig
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=
type=present
current=HIGH
}

A RFID element is no more detected¶

xpl-trig
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=
type=present
current=LOW
}
